description: Resource Type definition for AWS::WorkspacesInstances::Volume - Manages WorkSpaces Volume resources

Key.description: The key name of the tag
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: instance | volume | spot-instances-request | network-interface  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: The tags to apply to the resource
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags to apply to the resource

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

TagSpecification.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

VolumeId.markdownDescription:
Unique identifier for the volume

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^vol-[0-9a-zA-Z]{1,63}$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

AvailabilityZone.description: The Availability Zone in which to create the volume
AvailabilityZone.markdownDescription:
The Availability Zone in which to create the volume

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-z]{2}-[a-z]+-\d[a-z](-[a-z0-9]+)?$  
Update requires: Replacement

Encrypted.description: Indicates whether the volume should be encrypted
Encrypted.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether the volume should be encrypted

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: Replacement

Iops.description: The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS)
Iops.markdownDescription:
The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS)

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement

KmsKeyId.description: The identifier of the AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) to use for Amazon EBS encryption
KmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) to use for Amazon EBS encryption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: Replacement

SizeInGB.description: The size of the volume, in GiBs
SizeInGB.markdownDescription:
The size of the volume, in GiBs

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement

SnapshotId.description: The snapshot from which to create the volume
SnapshotId.markdownDescription:
The snapshot from which to create the volume

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^snap-[0-9a-zA-Z]{1,63}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Throughput.description: The throughput to provision for a volume, with a maximum of 1,000 MiB/s
Throughput.markdownDescription:
The throughput to provision for a volume, with a maximum of 1,000 MiB/s

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement

The volume type

Type: String

Update requires: Replacement
